What are the symptoms of Age-related Macular Degeneration ?,"An early symptom of wet AMD is that straight lines appear wavy. If you notice this condition or other changes to your vision, contact your eye care professional at once. You need a comprehensive dilated eye exam.",NIHSeniorHealth,Age-related Macular Degeneration
